node.title: 800 homes in Forbes could be evacuated as flood levels continue to rise
node.alt: Aerial shots of a flooded river.
node.description: Residents in flood-prone areas of Forbes have another day to prepare for major flooding, with the peak now expected on Wednesday.
node.content:
["The central west NSW town of Forbes is set to face major flooding from today with a peak expected on Wednesday.", "The Lachlan River at Forbes could reach up to 10.65 m on Wednesday with major flooding possible from Tuesday night.", "The river upstream at Nanami yesterday exceeded the heights seen during the devastating 2016 floods, with levels holding steady at 12.38 m Tuesday morning.", "In a message posted on the council Facebook page the Forbes Shire Council Mayor, Cr Phyllis Miller, said the river at Nanami was almost a metre above where it was in 2016.", "\"I just don't want anyone to be complacent,\" Cr Miller said.", "\"If you suffered at all in 2016\u00a0at your property\u00a0please do your preparations.\"", "On Monday the State Emergency Service said it was considering issuing an evacuation order for up to 800 homes.", "An evacuation warning is in place for low-lying areas of the town, and an order affecting about 800 properties may be issued this evening.\u00a0", "Cr Miller said Forbes always had ample warning for floods, and people have\u00a0been making the most of the time to water-proof their properties.\u00a0", "\"Six weeks ago we had a scare, and we thought we may have got a flood then, so consequently we've been filling sandbags,\" Cr Miller said.", "\"We knew there would eventually have been a flood and we've been very prepared. I think we're doing everything right so that our community is safe.", "The flood is being intensified by the release\u00a0of thousands of megalitres from the Wyangala Dam upstream and the swollen Lachlan tributary, the Belubula River.", "On Monday, Water NSW spokesman Tony Webber said inflows to dam had\u00a0been significant and made a tough situation harder.", "\"What made this more challenging was the dam was already full \u2014 we pulled it down where we could,\" Mr Webber said.", "Mr Webber said the authority would now work to lower the dam back to 100 per cent capacity by mid-week to provide some space for the next round of rainfall.", "", "
Residents of Forbes have been sand bagging low-lying properties with flood waters now expected to peak on Wednesday.(ABC Central West: Xanthe Gregory)
"]
